pipeline.honey.name: Honey Shaders
config.honey.help.tone_mapping: Enables tone mapping which brings out more detail in bright parts of the screen.
config.honey.help.stylized_water: When true, uses an animated and cartoony water texture instead of the default.
config.honey.help.enable_bloom: Whether or not bloom is enabled. Will lower performance when enabled.
config.honey.help.bloom_style: Emissive is based on the blocklight's emissive value, luminance is based on the brightness of pixels on the screen. ;Luminance style has less issues but is WIP.
config.honey.help.bloom_opacity: The opacity at which bloom is added on to the original image.
config.honey.help.bloom_quality: Performance cost is exponential, samples = quality squared.
config.honey.help.sunlight_emissivity: The value of the sun's emissivity. Used for bloom.
config.honey.help.moonlight_emissivity: The value of the moon's emissivity. Used for bloom.
config.honey.help.auto_exposure: Lowers the bloom intensity the more bright bloom is on the screen. Performance cost is not linear. 0 to disable.
config.honey.help.hunger_desaturation: Desaturates the screen when hunger effect is active.
config.honey.help.fire_resistance_tint: Tints the lightmap red when fire resistance effect is active.
config.honey.help.water_breathing_tint: Tints the lightmap blue when water breathing effect is active.
config.honey.help.underwater_blur: Blurs the screen when the player is underwater or in lava.
config.honey.help.underwater_blur_amt: The amount at which the screen is blurred underwater.
config.honey.help.translucent_blur: When false, blurs objects behind translucents.
config.honey.help.translucent_blur_amt: The amount at which the screen is blurred behind translucents.
config.honey.help.among_us: When false, adds among us overlay to the screen.
config.honey.help.trans_sky: When false, adds trans flag overlay to the sky.
config.honey.help.drunk_shaders: When false, adds some extra crazy. Don't use this if you get dizzy or epileptic!
